title: Benji the hunted
creator_credit: Joe Camp, Ben Vaughn and Embark
brief_description: Benji faces his toughest challenge as he braves the elements after being lost at sea and washed ashore in North America. Benji is responsible for his own survival as well as the litter of orphaned cougar cubs relying on him to guide them to safety. Created and directed by Joe Camp.
